name: social-media-manager
description: A comprehensive social media management system for Suite E Studios and @StPeteMusic

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.docker:build: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json frontend/node_modules frontend/package-lock.json && npm install --package-lock-only && cd frontend && npm install --package-lock-only && cd .. && docker build -t social-media-manager .
